title: Add error codes to a few errors

body:
With elog(), you get XX000 "internal_error", which sounds scary.

It's not self-evident what the right error codes for some of these errors are, but I tried to use my best judgment.
Thanks @hlinnaka, makes sense to me. Going to wait until 0.8.0 to merge since it's a slightly breaking change.
Starting to merge 0.8.0 work. Thanks again @hlinnaka!
